sources.snippet: Dependence on Affiliate Revenue Model: NerdWallet's primary revenue stream is through affiliate marketing, which can be susceptible to fluctuations in the financial market and changes in partner relationships. sources.title: Nerdwallet Inc: Business Model, SWOT Analysis, and Competitors 2024
sources.snippet: NerdWallet primarily generates revenue through affiliate marketing. When users click on links to financial products, such as credit cards or loans, and subsequently apply for those products, NerdWallet earns a commission from the financial institutions. This model has proven effective due to the high volume of traffic NerdWallet attracts. 2.
